trans-unit.source: An instance of BookmarkReachedEventArgs is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> object raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event.
trans-unit.target: Viene creata un'istanza di BookmarkReachedEventArgs quando il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>dell'oggetto genera il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>eventi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer> raises the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> event when it encounters a bookmark while processing any of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, or <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: La <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>Genera il <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached>evento quando incontra un segnalibro durante l'elaborazione del <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A>, o <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsmlAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakSsml%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.SpeakAsync%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.Speak%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer.BookmarkReached> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.SpeechSynthesizer>

trans-unit.source: To obtain the name and location of the bookmark that triggered the event, access the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A> and the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> properties in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Per ottenere il nome e la posizione del segnalibro che ha generato l'evento, accedere al <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>e la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A>proprietà nel gestore per l'evento.</xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.AudioPosition%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.BookmarkReachedEventArgs.Bookmark%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the time offset at which the bookmark was reached.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'ora in cui è stato raggiunto il segnalibro di offset.

trans-unit.source: Returns the location in the audio input stream of a synthesis engine when the event was raised.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la posizione nel flusso di input audio di un motore di sintesi quando viene generato l'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the bookmark that was reached.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome del segnalibro che è stato raggiunto.

trans-unit.source: Returns a value for the name of the bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un valore per il nome del segnalibro.
